clues.text: Of course, Pooh is cited in the entry for this noun: "he sat down and took the top off his jar of" it

(Sarah of the Clue Crews presents from the Witte Museum in San Antonio.) The Witte Museum's collection includes partialbustsof Abraham Lincoln and Theodore Roosevelt, sculpted by Gutzon Borglum as studies for his execution of this much larger project
